definition: A professional who designs and plans the construction of buildings, structures, and spaces, taking into account aesthetic, functional, and technical aspects. They typically work closely with clients, engineers, and construction teams to ensure the successful realization of architectural projects.

examples.english: The architect designed an impressive building.
